item.title: Golang Exercism
item.description: Exercism – Bob 我的方法：(总之非常愚蠢就是了) func Hey(remark string) string { // Write some code here to pass the test suite. // Then remove all the stock comments. // They're here to help you get started but they only clutter a finished solution. // If you leave them in, reviewers may protest! if strings.EqualFold(remark, "") { return "Fine. Be that way!" } whitespace := true for _, item := range []byte(remark) { if !
